prodNameC: 埃達堤斯腮腺炎病毒 IgM
ingredientsDesc:
MICROPLATE:
wells coated with antihuman IgM monoclonal antibodies.
CONJUGATE:
monoclonal antibodies labelled with peroxidase, in phosphate buffer with phenol 0.05% and bronidox 0.02%. 
POSITIVE CONTROL:
Diluted human serum containing anti-Mumps IgM antibodies, in Phosphate buffer 0.01 mol/L with BSA 1% and sodium azide. 0.09%.
CUT-OFF CONTROL:
Diluted human serum containing anti-Mumps IgM antibodies, in Phosphate buffer 0.01 mol/L with BSA 1% and sodium azide 0.09%. 
IgM NEGATIVE CONTROL:
Diluted human serum in Phosphate buffer 0.01 mol/L with BSA 1% and sodium azide 0.09%.
SUBSTRATE:
Tetramethylbenzidine 0.26 mg/mL and hydrogen peroxide 0.01% stabilised in citrate buffer 0.05 mol/L.
DILUENT 50X:
Proteic solution concentrated 50 times, with added phenol 0.05% and Bronidox 0.02%. 
WASH BUFFER 10X:
Phosphate buffered saline, concentrated 10 times; contains Brij 0.5%. 
STOP SOLUTION:
H2SO4 0.3 mol/L. 
ANTIGEN:
Purified Mumps virus, inactivated by treatment with beta-propiolactone, in Phosphate
applicantName: 美艾利爾健康股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市大同區塔城街64號3樓
efficacy: 用於血清試驗中鑑定對血清中腮腺炎病毒的IgM抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3380 腮腺炎病毒血清試劑

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: VIA CRISTONI, 12, 40033 CASALECCHIO DI RENO, BOLOGNA (BO), ITALY
